name: Chocolate heart of Geneva
description:
Discover Geneva`s amazing historical center and its
best chocolateries, 2 pleasures in 1 tour!  Experience charming old center of Geneva full of beautiful buildings and nice cozy squares, get the fantastic views over the lake ... enjoying fantastic chocolate creations handmade based on closely-guarded, centuries-old secrets still known only to
"maîtres chocolatiers". The transformation of cocoa into chocolate
is in a mystic world between science and magic!
